workflow.action: User defines font system in theme.fonts with semantic categories (title, body, mono) including family, fallback, weights, and typography properties
workflow.validation: All font configurations validate with required 'family' property and optional fallback, weights (100-900), size, lineHeight, letterSpacing, transform, url
workflow.expectedState: Font tokens stored in theme.fonts object with title (display), body (text), and mono (code) categories

workflow.action: System generates CSS @font-face rules for custom fonts and applies font-family declarations to component selectors
workflow.validation: CSS font stacks created with primary font + fallback (e.g., 'Inter, system-ui, sans-serif')
workflow.expectedState: @font-face { font-family: 'Inter'; src: url(...); } body { font-family: Inter, system-ui, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.5; }

workflow.action: Typography components reference font tokens via theme.fonts.body for paragraphs, theme.fonts.title for headings, theme.fonts.mono for code
workflow.validation: All text elements use themed fonts, no hardcoded font-family values in components
workflow.expectedState: Headings use title font with lowercase transform, body text uses body font with 16px/1.5, code blocks use mono font

workflow.action: User views application with complete typography system across headings, body text, and code blocks
workflow.validation: Consistent font hierarchy with display font for headings, readable body font, and monospace code font
workflow.expectedState: Professional typography system with branded fonts and optimal readability

assertions: All 3 font categories (title, body, mono) generate @font-face rules and CSS declarations
Title font (Bely Display) used for h1-h6 headings with lowercase transform and letter-spacing
Body font (Inter) used for paragraphs with 16px size and 1.5 line-height for readability
Mono font (JetBrains Mono) used for code elements with monospace fallback
Font weights loaded: title (400, 700), body (300-700), mono (400, 700)
Fallback fonts specified: title → Georgia, serif; body → system-ui, sans-serif; mono → monospace
Google Fonts URLs generate <link> tags in <head> for remote font loading
Text transformation applied: heading 'Our Mission' renders as 'our mission'
Complete typography system covers all text contexts: headings, body, code
Font tokens enable consistent typography across all pages and components
Professional branded typography with display font for impact, readable body font, technical mono font

integrationPoints: Theme fonts integrate with typography components (h1-h6, p, span, code)
Theme fonts integrate with text transform (lowercase/uppercase/capitalize via transform property)
Theme fonts integrate with spacing system (letter-spacing for headings)
Theme fonts integrate with color system (font + color = complete text styling)
Font URL property enables Google Fonts or self-hosted font loading
Font weights array specifies which weights to load (reduces font file size)
Fallback fonts ensure graceful degradation when custom fonts fail to load
Line-height and size properties establish baseline typography grid
Font categories (title/body/mono) provide semantic font system
Webflow/Framer-style typography with centralized font management
